data.12:
[u]Earthen Pillar[/u]
3mp

Create a temporary pillar of stone in a nearby space, blocking movement and line of sight.
data.empty:
[u]Skill Slot[/u]


Empty skill slot. Acquire Skill Scrolls to get new skills.
data.manablast:
[u]Mana Blast[/u]
4mp

Fire a bolt of pure magic, dealing 3 damage to target enemy in line of sight
data.shield:
[u]Shield[/u]
3mp

Gain a magic shield that absorbs 6 hp of damage. Decays by 1 if not hit.
data.knightleap:
[u]Knight's Leap[/u]
2mp

Channel the mystic power of the Knights of Chess to teleport a short distance.
data.manacharge:
[u]Mana Charge[/u]
Passive

Build up charge for each enemy killed, gaining 1 mp at 3 charges.
data.soulsiphon:
[u]Soul Siphon[/u]
Passive

Harvest the magical energies of enemies killed, gaining temporary mana.
data.knockback:
[u]Knockback[/u]
2mp

Perform a melee attack, knocking back an adjacent enemy in addition to dealing damage.
data.earthpillar:
[u]Earthen Pillar[/u]
3mp

Create a temporary pillar of stone to block movement or deal 2 damage to target enemy.
data.E_SlimeBase:
[u]Slime[/u]
HP #1  Dmg #2

A blob of viscous ooze, seemingly sentient. Moves every other turn.
data.E_SkeletonBase:
[u]Skeleton[/u]
HP #1  Dmg #2

Skeletal remains animated by some malevolent force. Moves every turn.
data.E_GhostBase:
[u]Ghost[/u]
HP #1  Dmg #2

An evil spirit of unknown origin, capable of firing dark magic. Moves every other turn.
